formula: Expansion of q^(-1) * (phi^3(q) - phi^3(-q)) / 4 in powers of q^2 where phi() is a Ramanujan theta function. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 12 2011A005875(2*n + 1) = 2 * a(n). - _Michael Somos_, Mar 12 2011
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, 0, n = 2*n + 1; polcoeff( sum( k=1, sqrtint(n), 2 * x^k^2, 1 + x*O(x^n))^3 / 2, n))} /* _Michael Somos_, Mar 12 2011 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
